REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1015 reute u f BC-MAFINA-BOND-WITH-WARR 04-08 0039

TEXT.TITLE: MAFINA BOND WITH WARRANTS SET AT 250 MLN SFR
TEXT.BODY: The issue amount of Mafina BV's seven year two pct Swiss franc bond with equity warrants has been set at 250 mln Swiss francs, lead manager Credit Suisse said. REUTER
